Funding incentives

Shooting in Sudbury means:

  • No film permit fees
  • Assistance with streamlining permits and approvals, scouting, accommodations and ground transportation, arrangements
  • for facilities, liaison with community partners and utilities
  • Provincial and Federal tax credits
  • Northern Ontario specific financial incentives
